title.rendered: An Interview Session with Digiperform’s Ex-Trainee – Priya

content.rendered: A chit-chat session with one of our Ex-trainees, Priya, a B.tech Student who decided to learn Digital Marketing to get skilled with latest marketing trends. Why? Let’s read to know further: Q1- Please share your personal and professional background. In which profile and company you are working currently? I have pursued B.tech in Electronics and Communication and have done a couple of content writing, both freelancing and at the organizational level as well. A few months back, I enrolled in Digital Marketing course at Digiperform and now I am looking for good jobs in the same profile along with my freelancing career. Q2- Why have you chosen the career in Digital Marketing? How do you get to know about Digital Marketing? I got to know about digital marketing by a senior at my college. She insisted me to start a personal blog on WordPress when I was in my final year. That’s how it got started. I believe coming from a technical background has helped me really well. I want to make a career in Digital Marketing because I find it very interesting. Q3- How is Digital Marketing helping in your career? It is not only helping me but helping my father as well. My father is an artist, I have made a website for him so that I can take his name to another level through online promotion. Q4-How you feel digital marketing can help students learn as well as earn? Digital marketing is for everyone, whether you have just passed your board exams or you are a house maker. There is no age bar in this field. It is very interesting, unpredictable, constantly changing, and uncontrollable field. The best part about digital marketing is you can do anything of your choice and no one can stop you. You can be a full-time employee or freelancer as per your choice and convenience. Q5- Why did you choose Digiperform over other digital marketing training companies? Before enrolling in this course, I did a lot of extensive research and took trial classes of other digital marketing training companies/institutes as well. Digiperform had my YES in the first go itself. Q6- How was your experience with Digiperform. Please share your memorable moments? My experience with Digiperform has been incredible. The course was helpful, engaging and thought-provoking. It was good to be a part of friendly batchmates, got to learn a lot from a few as the course unfolded. Overall the course was paced perfectly. The content of the LMS is great and easy to grasp with 24X7 private access to students. Q7- How is the faculty and training in Digiperform? The faculty and training in Digiperform are amazing. Without their guidance and support, this course wouldn’t have been beneficial. The trainers are not just a teacher, but educational rockstars. Thank you Digiperform for such a lovely experience. Q8- In your opinion, what is the scope of digital marketing in coming years? Any industry won’t go anywhere without Digital Marketing. Digital Marketing has a bright scope because it’s an interesting platform and ANYONE can learn and do things of their choice. Digital marketing gives numerous career options for everyone. You can be a social media marketer, content marketer, online marketer, campaign expert etc, anything as per your preferences and interests. Q9- What are your future plans? My future plans are to learn more about digital marketing and enhance my career in the same profile. Q10- Would you like to give any message to your readers? Learn digital marketing and make your career brighter!   Thanks a lot Priya for sharing your valuable input and being the part of Digiperform family. We wish you a great success. —————————————— For more related testimonials, watch below:
